data.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium：Tatakai no Banka
data.detailed_description:
Add Tatakai no Banka to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

The spirits of demonic warlords have taken over the world. You alone can stand against the forces of evil! Use your mastery of the martial arts to defeat the demonic armies!

Players: 1-2 Player Tag Team
Genre: Action
Versions: Japanese

data.short_description: Add Tatakai no Banka to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! The spirits of demonic warlords have taken over the world. You alone can stand against the forces of evil! Use your mastery of the martial arts to defeat the demonic armies!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 720P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
